content.question: Which of the following is more likely to occur when there are high barriers to entry in an industry?

choices.label: The firm(s) in the industry earn economic profits in the long run.
The industry will be characterized by diseconomies of scale.
The firm(s) in the industry are price takers.
The firm(s) in the industry will charge a price equal to average total cost.
The firm(s) will charge a price on the inelastic portion of the demand curve.

content.answer: The firm(s) in the industry earn economic profits in the long run.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
